meanings.definition: The act of forming a ring or circle.
meanings.sent1: The annulation of the wreath was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The children danced in an annulation around the maypole.
meanings.sent3: The annulation of colorful hula hoops made the audience smile.
meanings.sent4: The annulation of planets around the sun is a marvel of nature.
meanings.sent5: The annulation of smoke rings in the air mesmerized the onlookers.

meanings.definition: The process of adding a ring to a molecule.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the annulation of benzene rings in organic compounds.
meanings.sent2: The annulation of carbon atoms forms the basis of many organic reactions.
meanings.sent3: The annulation of wedding rings symbolized their eternal bond.
meanings.sent4: The annulation of atoms in a molecule can change its properties drastically.
meanings.sent5: The annulation of a new ring to the molecule enhanced its stability.

meanings.definition: The act of joining or connecting in a series.
meanings.sent1: The annulation of train cars created a long line on the tracks.
meanings.sent2: The annulation of events in the story led to an exciting climax.
meanings.sent3: The annulation of jokes in his speech made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The annulation of thoughts in her mind formed a clear plan.
meanings.sent5: The annulation of beads on the necklace made it look elegant.
